name: Nyet 3: Revenge of the Mutant Stones
summary: Nyet 3: Revenge of the Mutant Stones is a Tetris variant written by Proline software. It consists of upto 108 stages, all based on the Tetris ruleset. The objective is to clear a set number of lines within the stage, but each has a twist in the ruleset discovered during play.

name: Nyaz
summary: A dungeon crawler for cats that even beginners can play.

name: Nykra
summary: You arrived from the outer realms of our dimension, asking unanswerable questions. You came seeking something the Heptaverse has been afraid of for millennia. You don't know who you are, or how you got here. So tell me, Keu, what's your purpose?

name: NY Times
summary:
A unique online PC game in the RolePlay (Role-Playing Game) genre, with an interesting open world, plenty of game entertainment, and a rich culture of the Big Apple.

In this game, you create your own character, who will later exist with other players in virtual New York. You can choose any role in this world: either you're a peaceful worker or a criminal mastermind, or vice versa - it's up to you. Be whoever you want to be!

name: Nyo-Nin-Jima: My New Life in Charge of a Tropical Island
summary: The censored Steam release of the Japanese romance-adventure VN from hit developer PacoPaco Soft! Stepping ashore a remote southern island, the protagonist’s battered spirits are soothed by the lovely Kowakame family that takes him in. However, many more unexpected surprises await him on the island...

name: Nyoki Nyoki: Tabidachi-hen
summary:
A falling block puzzle game announced for 2016 for the the Nintendo 3DS. From Moo Niitani, creator of the Puyo Puyo series.

This is a "fighting puzzle" video game based on 2003 Neo Geo game Pochi and Nyaa, co-produced by Aiky, Taito and SNK, and inspired by Puyo Puyo.

name: NyctoType
summary: A multithreaded typing battle where speed and strategy decide victory. command virus-shaped pieces, send them at each other, and destroy your opponent. Fast inputting alone won’t save you—think tactically in this fresh, competitive typing game!

name: Nyasha Valkyrie
summary: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

name: Nymphomania Priestess
summary: In this RPG, you play as an adventurer who is paired with a priestess who is modest and ladylike in public, but in private she is a nymphomaniac.

name: NYXverse.AI
summary: Explore a platform with thousands of AI-generated 3D characters. Customize personalities, appearances, voices, and stories, all synced with real-world time. Unleash your creativity, crafting unique virtual worlds. Join a community of creators and share your imagination.

name: Nya Nya Nya Girls
summary: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

name: NYT Games
summary: A mobile app consisting of various games by the New York Times, such as the Crossword, Wordle, Spelling Bee, The Mini, and more.

name: Nyanco Dream
summary: Nyanco goes to the Gensokyo Touhou World!

name: Nyheim
summary: Nyheim is a single-player digital boardgame about rebuilding the titular city of Nyheim after a lethal pandemic. As survivors of the disease, your party must explore the districts of Nyheim, face mutated rats, gather supplies and lead the efforts towards a new society!

name: Nylos
summary: Nylos is a physics-based puzzle platformer where players use unique powers to solve puzzles in creative ways. Explore diverse environments from lush caves to high-tech labs. And uncover the hidden secrets of this world!

name: Nyandanoid
summary: An Arkanoid/Block Breaker clone for PlayDate

name: Nyanroo the Supercat
summary:
Chosen by a magic cloth you must face a gang of evil dogs trying to conquer the world.

Gather different abilities with the help of the Power Yarns scattered through the world to slash and pounce your way through 14 stages and 7 amazing bosses.

name: NYT Crossplay: Play and Spell
summary:
Go word-to-word. Challenge yourself or friends in this 2-player word board game

Play with friends, compete and connect with Crossplay, a new 2-player word game from NYT Games that blends socializing and strategy. Play distraction-free, build words and use built-in tools to learn, improve and win, or simply enjoy the challenge.

name: Nyan Cat Forever
summary: Endless rhythm game based on the famous Nyan Cat meme.

name: Nyx Legacy
summary: In Nyx: Legacy, you follow Lyn, the protective older sister, and Nyx, her reckless yet fearless younger sister. Together they fight for survival in a world where danger is everywhere.

name: Nyasha
summary: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

name: Nyancle Racing
summary: Nyancle Racing is a top-down racing game from Japan. The gameplay is reminiscent of the 1983 classic Bump 'N' Jump. The player controls a vehicle shaped like a mechanic animal on a track filled with obstacles, collectable rolling pieces of candy (the game currency) and other enemy racers. The main objective is to arrive at the end before the timer runs out. The competition tries to delay progress by bumping into the vehicle to steer it off the road. The racers can take flight by passing over some squares scattered throughout the course. Pit-stops (presented as a house with a red sign painted on the roof and a "IN" sign painted on the track) are positioned at regular intervals beside the main track.

name: Nyakori's Rabbit Doll: After Story
summary: In the true ending, the girl finally met her missing sister. It seems like a sweet and perfect ending...but something is going wrong. Here is the story of a black-haired girl and a white-haired catgirl who continue to search for the truth.

name: Nyakori's Rabbit Doll
summary: This is a short, RPG Maker game with horror elements incorporated into a short story full of puzzles. The player will control a young cat-eared girl as she seeks to find her friend Nyakori, and her missing rabbit doll, all while attempting to not fall victim to the forces at play in the sinister mansion she finds herself in.

name: Nyan Cat: The Space Journey
summary: The world’s number one rainbow-riding catronaut is back to go where no cat has gone before! The countdown has already begun - so jump into the cockpit and prepare for an incredibly cute adventure! A whole galaxy of cake, cheese and candy is out there, waiting only for you to explore!

name: Nyaa-kuza!!
summary: Created by students from the University of Utah's EAE program, Catzooka Studios presents: Nyaa-kuza!! Nyaa-kuza!! is a narrative based fighting game where you play as an ex-yakuza cat, traveling through the outskirts of Japan in order to save your catnapped wife!

name: Nyassembled!
summary: Nyassembled! is a simultaneous turn-based tactical RPG with a plan-action system. Build your modular mechs, command electronic cats, and explore a procedurally generated world.

name: Nyanco Project
summary: Nyanco Meets Anime Girls!

name: Nymphomaniac: Sex Addict
summary: A visually stunning story about a nymphomaniac who loves her body, sex and adrenaline. All this presented in a photorealistic audiovisual setting.

name: NyxQuest: Kindred Spirits
summary:
Fly with Nyx in her dangerous search for her dearest friend Icarus. With NYXQUEST: KINDRED SPIRITS you will discover a new type of game play and mechanics that will surprise you...

The action takes place in ancient Greece, a place inhabited by all kind of fantastic creatures, where the fate of humans is in the hands of capricious Gods.

Through impressive sceneries, you will guide Nyx in her icarian quest, and will enjoy the ultimate experience: the joy of flight!

But be careful! These surroundings are dangerous for celestial beings. Without your help she will not be able to complete her task. Protect and guide her flight, and take advantage of the incredible powers that gods such as Zeus or Eolus will grant…if you figure out how to reach them!

name: Nyan Destroyer
summary: Nyan Destroyer is a military squad of special purpose, whose main goal is to cleanse the universe of cute creatures. These creatures have already enslaved most of the human population that is why people prefer to play carelessly with them, and not to destroy them... Fight back against them!

name: Nyan Heroes
summary: Step into Nyan Heroes, a free-to-play, third-person hero shooter where intelligent cats pilot powerful mechs known as Guardians. Experience agility, strategy, and precision in a world shaped by feline intelligence.

name: Nyxerion
summary: In Nyxerion, the gods have chosen you, not for their glory but for their amusement. Fight for your survival, wielding mystical powers in ruthless arenas. Challenge friends and foes in epic battles under the gods' cruel gaze. Will you fall, or will you rise to triumph?

name: Nyaaaanvy
summary: Physics sumo-wrestling game! A heated battle for dignity among mysterious cat-like creatures. Nyanvy who wins the battle can be a true cat!! Could it be...?

name: Nyan Cat: Lost In Space
summary: Play with the most celebrated flying cat in human history. Drink milk, eat ice-cream, collect coins, buy gorgeous boosts, fly like a superhero (sorry... supercat), jump onto platforms made of cake, avoid angry dogs, and discover the infinite space. And that's not all, you can choose from multiple game modes, where you can play with Nyan Cat's evil foe Tac Nayn, learn to fly on different planets with Nyan Wings or visit parallel universes. If you're tired, you can even train and feed your own Nyanagotchi. Oh, and last but not least: you can enjoy the wonderful Nyan-song as many times as you want! All this funky stuff can't be missed.

name: Nyaa to Chuu no Rainbow Magic 2
Nyasha Winter
summary: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

name: Nyako: Restaurant Tycoon
summary: A restaurant, a small local cafe, or a van with glowing hot dogs? In Nyako Restaurant, you can create your own business empire and conquer the restaurant world.

name: Nyan to Suteki na Natsuiro Days
Nympho's Path
summary: Nympho's Path is a hentai puzzle game for adults, where your goal is to defeat every enemy who stands in your way of pleasure. Are you ready to make everything try to satisfy your lust?

name: Nyan-Tech
summary: Nyan-Tech is 5th game from Japanese Xbox 360 Indie developer Dot Zo Games.

name: Nyghtmare: The Ninth King
summary: Nyghtmare: The Ninth King is a dark-fantasy, classic-vania, action-platform game that aims to make an authentic Game Boy [COLOR] retro feel that is as close as possible to the original.

name: NyanNyanConnect
summary:
A puzzle game where you move the stage.
The player can move the stage like the windows on your computer desktop.
Connect and stack the stages well to create a path, grab the key and get to the goal!

name: Nykrig
summary: A claustrophobic twin stick shooter

name: Nya Nya Nya Girls 2
summary: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

name: Nyan Nyan Nyanko no Nyan Collection
summary: Nyan Nyan Nyanko no Nyan Collection is an Action game, developed and published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Nyctophobia: Devil Unleashed
summary: A single-player pyschological horror game that will take you to the deepest and darkest secrets of the asylum.

name: Nyanko Island
summary:
A game of keeping a cat on an island
Collect gold to invite new cats, raise the level of cats,
Build new buildings and upgrade the level of the building.
The higher the level of cats and buildings, the more gold you will get.

name: Nyanco Card
summary: Nyanco Card ~ 東方夢猫 幻想遊戯 is a fan-made game based on the Touhou Project worldview. Enjoy reliving Nyanco's memories while also making new ones with her and the Touhou characters in the Gensokyo world!

name: Nyan Cat: Candy Match
summary: Nyan Cat: Candy Match takes your favourite switch and match game mechanics and nyans them up to an intergalactic level. Are you a candy enthusiast? We got you covered! Do you love cats? Good news: cats love you too! Fan of rainbows? We got 'em! Always wanted to be more Nyan? Look no further!

name: Nyctophobia: Fear the Dark
summary: Nyctophobia is a thrilling physiological horror game that challenges players to confront a terrifying SCP that preys on their deepest fears. The game takes place in a neighborhood where players must navigate through the darkness and uncover the mystery behind the strange occurrences.

name: NYX x Barbie: The Movie
summary: NYX x Barbie: The Movie is a promotional arcade game based on the 2023 Barbie movie.

name: Nyyo
summary: A 2D Action, questing game. Seize swords and shields to help V, who needs to know what is waiting for him outside the village. Head off on the adventure together to reveal Nyyo’s hidden secrets

name: Nyanpaya
summary:
It's a 3-match puzzle game that can be played by up to 8 people!

If you align 3 or more pieces with the same pattern, the pieces will disappear and you will get points!

Score up by erasing while disappearing! Aim for a high score and erase them within the time limit!

name: Nympho Monster Domination
summary: A man filled with pent-up sexual frustration is suddenly summoned to another world as it's would-be-savior. Dominate the hordes of horny monster girls to add to your mythical harem, and maybe while you're at it save the world?

name: Nym: Path of the Skycaster
summary: An all new action platforming adventure, forge your own path through the vibrant ruins of Stratos, a sprawling interconnected world above the clouds. Follow the path of the Skycaster, master powerful elemental magics and close the Void before it rips the world asunder!

name: Nyan Puzzle
summary: Nyanpi is a Puzzle game involving you playing as a cat.

name: Nysunder
summary: Nysunder is a true hardcore, open world, FPS. It brings realistic gunplay mechanics & in-depth survival features into one package, to create intense combat. Leave your mark in the world by joining several unique factions, or simply go off-grid with your camper van. The choice is yours!

name: Nyctophobia
summary: Your truck is wrecked, your flashlight is dimming and darkness surrounds you. Your fears come alive. Get to the generator and bring back the light before “The Keeper” finds you.

name: Nyaf
summary: A funky, crazy Hidden Object Game that just feels good. Come have a good time into a warm and unique universe, with great art and music, bonus-games and layers of secrets. Select between 8 levels of difficulties, switch helps on and off, play as you wish!

name: Nyan Nyan Tower
summary: Doujin stage ascending game.

name: NYZD
summary: Yup you guessed it, another zombie shooter game but I swear it is diffrent just try it out lol. And while you are there bring your homies so you can have a LAN party like in good ol days

name: Nyanco Mine
summary: Nyanco is back! Let's play the classic brain training game Minesweeper now with cute cat girls! Are you ready?

name: Nyanko New Japan
summary: Released to celebrate the 8th anniversary of The Battle Cats. Puzzle game where you stack Japanese prefectures on top of each other to create a New Japan.

name: Nystagmus
summary: An island, shrouded with darkness and clouds of mystery, is your only hope for salvation. In this first-person horror game, your character, an engineer in search for his fiancee, arrives at the suspicious island you’ve only ever heard about.

name: Nyanco Channel
summary: Welcome to Nyanco Channel! Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process that one does not become a monster. Moreover, should one gaze long enough into the abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you.

name: Nyasha Beach
summary: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

name: Nymphomania Paradox
summary: A role-playing game from TechnoBrake.

name: Nyanco Impact
summary: Hello, world! Was that a cat I saw? Like Pygmalion, you can create your ideal cat girl in this game. What serendipity awaits you? Find out for yourself!

name: Nyamo's Adventure
summary: A 2D Metroidvania platformer about a shapeshifting blob.

name: Nyanco Space
summary: Hi Nyancos! How are you? Crying Out Nyanco in the Center of the Universe!

name: Nympho Wife
summary: This is a novel game with adult expressions. Click only to advance the story. Please enjoy the sexy female sex expressions.

name: Nyran Survivors
summary: Embrace the role of Thoria's ultimate Mediator. In this gripping Action Roguelite, unlock diverse classes, harness thousands of spell combinations, and face epic boss battles. How long can you survive the endless enemy horde for?

name: N.Y.Zombies 2
summary:
The world you once knew is gone. The bustling streets of New York are now quiet, except for the occasional cry for help. Your friends, your family, your neighbors and coworkers are all dead. The end of the world has come… and it seems strangely familiar. 
 
Foursaken Media presents New York Zombies 2 – a sequel to the smash hit, and one of the original games of the genre, New York Zombies. You are an ordinary person who must survive in a new and hostile world. Everyone you once knew has become a creature whose only instinct is to hunt and kill the few remaining people who are unaffected. The odds are stacked against you – but you aren’t defenseless! Unleash a massive arsenal as you battle hordes of zombies across a ruined New York City landscape. Explore famous landmarks such as Times Square, Central Park, and the Brooklyn Bridge, now twisted and overrun by zombies. Uncover an epic and dynamic story as you try to find out what happened – and how to survive. N.Y.Z 2 takes you into a dark and action-packed world where there are no heroes, and the decisions between survival, morality, and humanity are no longer clear.

name: NY Warriors
summary: A multi-directional top-down shooter in which the player has to save New York City from a terroristic nuclear assault.

name: Nyxia Survivors
summary: Protect the world of Nyxia against hordes of monsters and demonic creatures coming from hell. In this Action-Roguelite dynamic game, play multiple heroes, find powerful equipment, spells and talents to defeat mighty enemies and rank among the best.

name: Nyanco
summary: NYANCO! (ฅ'ω'ฅ) The adventure game where you just have to walk in a line, forwards or backwards.

name: Nyctophilia
summary: Nyctophilia is 2D psychological thriller about bad things in your head.

name: Nyan Cat: Jump!
summary: Nyan Cat's rainbow has been stolen by Tac Nayn. Collect the seven colors of the rainbow to regain the ability to fly!

name: Nymph's Tower
summary: An exploration platformer about scaling a tower and discovering its secrets.

name: Nyanzou & Kumakichi: Let's make a flower garden
summary: Let's grow your favorite flowers

name: NYX: The Awakening
summary: Imprisoned by NYX, Vicky must follow the trail of her lost memories in a disturbing town. The neon 80’s vibe highlights the setting and the drama as you explore the twisted world. Will you be stuck in the nightmare forever or will you escape?

name: Nyanaconda
summary: A small rhythm game based on Nyanners cover of Anaconda.

name: Nyan Cat FLY!
summary: Guide Nyan Cat through the galaxy in his never-ending quest for YUMMIES! Eat yummies! Avoid veggies! Get a high score! Customize your Nyan Cat!

name: Nyannyan Prowrestling
summary: Female Wrestling game.

name: Nyan Cat!
summary: The first official Nyan Cat game, it started out as a Flash game before being ported to mobile phones.

name: Nyan Cat Adventure
summary: A platforming game starring the Nyan Cat. Players must pass each level to defeat his enemy, Waffle Cat.

name: Nymble
summary: Join Jack as he climbs the never-ending beanstalk in this cute turn-based puzzle platformer adventure. Explore 5 exciting worlds and 100 levels, encountering a vibrant cast of enemies each with their own unique abilities along the way.

name: Nyaruru Fishy Fight
summary: This game is a Metroidvania game with intense battle. Explore the world and collection power-ups with your cute cat girl! When magic curse suddenly occurred in a small town and all the residents grew cat ears, the real cat girl Nyaruru started her way to uncover the truth...

name: Nyomi Wants a Job!
summary: The greater being Nyomi wants a job in order to upgrade their form!

name: Nyctoban
summary: You must put all the lamps on their places. You have nyctophobia (fear of the dark) but don't worry, you can do it!

name: Nyasha Land of Elves
summary: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

name: Nyotai Inkan: Utsurikawaru Chijokuteki Koukishin
summary: While on a field trip to a museum, the protagonist's 4-person group accidently breaks a cursed jar due to some trivial dispute. And the following day, it seems that their minds and bodies are swapped because of the curse. Thus begins their struggle to dispel the curse in order to change back to normal.

name: Nyanyan Ga Nyan: Light Fantasy Gaiden
summary:
In the country village of Nekomura resides the cat tribe "Nyanyan". When the girls of the tribe reaches the age of 15 they have to pass the "adult ceremony" and when they pass the ceremony they get the "Choreography Command".

The player controls the destiny of a little girl of the tribe that starts a journey to search a crystal ball. During her journey she will meet different characters, change and use different clothes, and will have to face a lot of dangers. The adventure is just beginning, join her until the end of her quest.

This game was released only in Japan.

name: Nyanzou & Kumakichi Bomb Cave
summary: Avoid bombs, break the wall and proceed through the cave

name: Nyakamon
summary: Help NyaKaMon to get through challenging levels of sokoban!

name: Nytro
summary: 3D platformer inspired by the original Spyro trilogy, featuring a robot cat.

name: N.Y. Captor
summary: You play a marksman who has to rescue hostages from terrorists. Fire upon enemies from your position, but avoid shooting the bystanders. After the last life has been lost, a sequence shows your character falling from his perch to his death.

name: Nyana
summary: Join Nyana on her quest to both shatter the chains that have shackled her people and rebuild their society back up from the brink of extinction. Nyana is a story rich metroidvania set in an oppressive, yet beautifully hand-drawn world.

name: Nyamon Tamer: Retro Edition
summary: Nyamon Tamer - Retro Edition is a return to classic monster-taming genre. Tame Nyamon and explore a vast world filled with thrilling turn-based battles and a mysterious legend to uncover. Tamer challenge... Accepted!

name: Nyo-Nin-Jima: My New Life in Charge of a Tropical Island
summary: Stepping ashore a remote southern island, the protagonist’s battered spirits are soothed by the lovely Kowakame family that takes him in. However, many more unexpected surprises await him on the island...

name: Nyxx
summary: A classic 2d bullet hell shoot'em'up.

name: Nymphiad
summary: Nymphiad is a puzzle-platformer with a unique twist - each camera movement shifts the world itself.

name: Nyan Nikki
summary: Nyan Nikki is a fangame of both Yume Nikki and Nyan~ Neko Sugar Girls. You play as Raku-chan, one of the characters from the series.

name: Nyakamon Adventures
summary: - 30 levels of normal mode + 30 levels of hadrcore mode - Match the runes in the normal mode - 2 biomes - light and dark - Cute graphics - Relaxing music
